dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7157 IH: Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gosar introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area
section.text: Section 7 of the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Act of 2000 (54 U.S.C. 320101 note; Public Law 106â€“319; 114 Stat. 1284; 128 Stat. 3802) is amended by striking 2021 and inserting 2036.
